name: Worm Rampage
description:
You're a peaceful tunnel burrowing worm just minding your own business. Dive deep so you can breach and soar through the air like a majestic sky whale. Eat all the attack helicopters to win the game! Be careful not to lose yourself in the process.

Screenshots How to Play

Missiles will destroy the worm's body segments, but will only stun the worm when they collide with its head. If you lose all your body segments, you die.

Controls ============================================= | Mouse | Steering | --------------------------------------------- | Left Mouse Button | Burrow faster | ============================================= About

This game was made in under 72 hours during the Ludum Dare 48 Game Jam.

Credits

Game programming, design, and most of the art was done by Thomas Stucky. Check out more of my work @StarryNiteGames on Twitter, and my blog.

The retro cover art was contributed by Casey Marquez of Butterscotch Workshop. Check out more of her work @ButterScotchWo1 on Instragram.

Thanks to the various artists on opengameart.org whose work I incorporated into the game:

  • fungi_growth.flac
  • helicopter.zip
